text: Jarkovci () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Inđija municipality, in the Srem District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and its population numbering 604 people (2002 census). ==Name== The name of the village in Serbian is in the plural, and therefore it is grammatically correct to refer to it as "Jarkovci are" instead of "Jarkovci is". A hypothetical singular version of the name would be Jarkovac. ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Syrmia
title: Jarkovci
